video.title: Dollhouse
video.synopsis: Echo was routinely implanted with memories and skills needed to carry out missions, but after her mind is erased, disturbing recollections creep in.

episodes.synopsis: The designers of Dollhouse make millions as they continually reprogram Echo and the other actives to satisfy their clients' every pleasure or problem.
episodes.title: Ghost

episodes.synopsis: A psychopath turns his time with Echo into a deadly hunt, while Boyd, rendered helpless, cannot protect his charge.
episodes.title: The Target

episodes.synopsis: Echo becomes a backup singer to a diva in order to protect her from a deranged fan. Agent Ballard falls into a deadly trap set by the Russian Mafia.
episodes.title: Stage Fright

episodes.synopsis: Echo leads an expert safe-cracking team when a phone call wipes her memory. Sierra must take on the same persona to fulfill the mission.
episodes.title: Gray Hour

episodes.synopsis: Echo saves followers from a cult leader. The reality of Dollhouse grows for Agent Ballard with his first glimpse of the woman he knows as Caroline.
episodes.title: True Believer

episodes.synopsis: Ballard storms a house owned by a grieving Internet mogul and walks in on Echo. When they meet up again, Echo takes him in a fist-to-fist brawl.
episodes.title: Man on the Street

episodes.synopsis: A memory drug affects a college campus, sending Echo back to where it all began, and the entire Dollhouse staff falls victim to the hallucinogen.
episodes.title: Echoes

episodes.synopsis: When Echo frees three actives, they recall parts of their original personalities and discover the reasons they chose to enter the Dollhouse.
episodes.title: Needs

episodes.synopsis: Echo's evolving persona results in her requesting an assignment to save the Dollhouse from attack. Mellie's programming includes a warning for Paul.
episodes.title: A Spy in the House of Love

episodes.synopsis: A wealthy woman suspects she's about to die, so she places her memories with the Dollhouse so that she can return and find her murderer.
episodes.title: Haunted

episodes.synopsis: Paul's quest to save Echo thrusts him into the midst of a dark evil when he discovers how to infiltrate the Dollhouse.
episodes.title: Briar Rose

episodes.synopsis: Alpha imprints Echo to join in his savage murder spree and plans to destroy her original identity in the process.
episodes.title: Omega

episodes.synopsis: Aware of what the future holds, Echo plants clues in an attempt to save the world from the terror that is Dollhouse.
episodes.title: Epitaph One

episodes.synopsis: Picking up a few months after the first season finale, Echo weds a wealthy British businessman tied to one of Agent Ballard's open FBI cases.
episodes.title: Vows

episodes.synopsis: When Echo is imprinted as a mother with a newborn baby, she takes too strongly to motherhood as a result of Topher's modifications.
episodes.title: Instinct

episodes.synopsis: Echo and Victor's imprints collide when Echo is assigned as a seductive college student and Victor becomes the nephew of a Dollhouse shareholder.
episodes.title: Belle Chose

episodes.synopsis: Sierra is forced to face her past as her connection to the Rossum Corporation leads to obsession and murder.
episodes.title: Belonging

episodes.synopsis: Echo is sent to stop Senator Perrin before he can expose the Dollhouse's secrets, and Adelle and Topher travel to the Washington, D.C., Dollhouse.
episodes.title: The Public Eye

episodes.synopsis: Echo and Bennett have a shocking meeting as Adelle goes head-to-head with the ruthless head of the Washington, D.C., Dollhouse.
episodes.title: The Left Hand

episodes.synopsis: As Paul helps Echo regain control over all the personalities in her head, Topher perfects a way to turn anyone into a Doll.
episodes.title: Meet Jane Doe

episodes.synopsis: Someone's on a killing spree, and the victims have one thing in common: they've all been Echo's lovers.
episodes.title: A Love Supreme

episodes.synopsis: As his contract with the Dollhouse expires, Victor is released back into the world, where his military past threatens his future with Sierra.
episodes.title: Stop-Loss

episodes.synopsis: Victor's military past threatens his future with Sierra. Meanwhile, Echo is deemed too dangerous and is sent into her worst nightmare.
episodes.title: The Attic

episodes.synopsis: Topher races to reconstruct Echo's original personality and memories when Adelle realizes they are the key to averting a devastating future.
episodes.title: Getting Closer

episodes.synopsis: Sacrifices are made when Echo leads her crew to Arizona to dismantle the Rossum Corporation's mainframe.
episodes.title: The Hollow Men

episodes.synopsis: Set in the year 2020, Echo and her surviving Dollhouse crew attempt to restore order to a devastating future world before mankind is eliminated.
episodes.title: Epitaph 2: Return
